job.description: We are looking for a ltstronggtJava Factory Developerltstronggtltstronggt ltstronggtIf you are looking for a new project let us know your interest by applying for the sameltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtOwn the endtoend infrastructure of the companys cloudltligtltligtDefine and introduce security best practices identify gaps in infrastructure and come up withltligtltligtsolutionsltligtltligtDesign and implement tools and software to manage the companys infrastructureltligtltligtStay handson write and review code and documentation debug and root cause issues inltligtltligtproduction environmentltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience in managing cloudnative infrastructure setupltligtltligtPassionate about security and have a good understanding of industry best practicesltligtltligtExperience in programming languages like Python Golang and enjoying automating everything using codeltligtltligtGood skills and intuition on root cause issues in the production environmentltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience in TerraformltligtltligtExperience in database and network managementltligtltligtExperience in defining security policies and best practicesltligtltligtExperience in managing a large scale multicloud environmentltligtltligtKnowledge of SOC GDPR or ISO 27001 security compliance standards is a plusltbrgtltligtltulgtPowered by JazzHRltbrgtltbrgt9OT1R5Ldvc
